component.contact-message: In case you require any clarification or have any concern, kindly write to us at the below email addresses:

item.description: For Trading related queries, contact our customer service at
item.phone: Or call us on Toll free numbers 18002099191 / 1860 266 9191
item.description-2: For Demat account related queries contact us at

item.description: If you do not receive a satisfactory response at Level 1 within 3 working days, you may write to us at
item.description-2: if you feel you are still unheard, write to our customer service HOD at

item.description: If you still have not received a satisfactory response at Level 2 within 3 working days, you may contact
item.name: Mr Manoj Agarwal

item.description: If you have not received a satisfactory response at Level 3 within 7 working days, you may also approach
